caption.p: ( a) Cyclic voltammograms of a Pt-coated quartz crystal electrode (1.37 cm 2) at a scan rate of 0.05 V s −1 in 0.05 M Et 4NBF 4/DCE containing 0.001 mol L −1 [NiAmben] (black curve 1) or 0.001 mol L −1 [NiSalen] (red curve 2); ( b) CV curves of a Pt-coated quartz crystal electrode (1.37 cm 2) modified with poly-[NiAmben] (black curve 1) or poly-[NiSalen] (red curve 2) at a scan rate of 0.01 V s −1 (blue numbers indicate oxidation states of poly-[NiSalen]).
